name: Pakistan Bar Council Appeal (Amendment) Rules, 1996
tagline: Amendment of Rule 4 to substitute '200' with '1000'
content:
THE GAZETTE OF PAKISTAN, EXTRA., JUNE 1, 1996 789 
PAKISTAN BAR COUNCIL 
Rawalpindi, the 26th May, 1996 
—In exercise of the powers conferred by section 55 read 
he Legal Practitioners and Bar Councils Act, 1973 (XXXV 
3), and all other enabling provisions in this behalf, the Pakistan Bar Conn-
y makes the following amendments in the "Pakistan Bar Council Appeal 
1986 ":— 
Short title and commencement : 
These Rules may be called the "Pakistan Bar Council Appeal (Amend-
ment) Rules, 1996". 
(ii) They shall come into force at once. 
Amendment of Rule 4. 
The figure and signs " 200" appearing in clause (iii) of Rule 4 shall 
be substituted by the figure and fiigns " 1000 ". 
639/PBC/SEC/9 6.1 
1-IAM11) KHAN, 
Vice-Chairman. 
MUHAMMAD ARSHEL), 
Secretary.
